name: Rain of Awakening
description:
Rain of Awakening

A rainstorm hits the Earth unlike any other. Something is awakening. Make your way up to the clouds and search for the source of this rain. Can you stop the rain and save what is left of this world, or is it too late?

Fast-Paced Action Packed Platforming

Master your abilities and combine them to overcome your obstacles. Use your sword not only for protecting yourself but also as a way of gaining momentum.

Create Unique Builds With Upgrades

With each level you get, you will also be able to choose an upgrade.

Speed Is The Key

Every bit of speed will get you closer to your objective. After all, climbing up to the clouds is not an easy task.

Controls:

  • A/D - Move
  • W/Space - Jump
  • Mouse1 - Attack
  • Mouse2 - Dash
  • P/Esc - Pause
